T02TD1757E:238b-1: shr'i ma h'a k'a la s'a dha na bi khy'a ta /
T02TD1757E:238b-3: dpal nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs kyi rnam par bshad pa /
T02TD1757E:238b-4: dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1757E:238b-5: dang po lha la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
T02TD1757E:238b-6: rab tu 'jigs pa'i klu rnams kyis brgyan zhing //
T02TD1757E:238b-7: phyag gnyis dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes //
T02TD1757E:238b-8: shes rab la 'khyud phung po'i rang bzhin 'dud //
T02TD1757E:238b-9: stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis de nas ni //
T02TD1757E:238b-10: stong phrag bcu gnyis pa las de bzhin du //
T02TD1757E:239a-2: shin tu dkon pa'i brjod bya rnam par bshad //
T02TD1757E:239a-3: bdag gi bla mas ji ltar bsdus te bshad //
T02TD1757E:239a-4: sems can kun gyi snying gi don gyi phyir //
T02TD1757E:239a-5: de rnams kun ni bdag gis bshad par bya //
T02TD1757E:239a-6: de yang bla ma'i bka' drin 'thob pa'o //
T02TD1757E:239a-7: dang po dka' thub la gnas pas /
T02TD1757E:239a-8: dur khrod la sogs pa'i gnas su /
T02TD1757E:239a-9: gcig pur dben par gnas pas bsgom /
T02TD1757E:239a-10: dur khrod ni ling+ga gcig pa'am /
T02TD1757E:239a-15: gzhan yang dben pa'i gnas dang /
T02TD1757E:239a-18: sangs rgyas thob par 'dod pa'i sems kyis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin de ltar bdag nyid bsams la /
T02TD1757E:239a-19: de dag gi don ni skad cig gis rang nyid nag po chen po'i nga rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar padma dang nyi ma la /
T02TD1757E:239a-20: bgegs 'joms par byed pa'i sngags brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1757E:239a-21: de nas aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'atma konyaham /
T02TD1757E:239a-22: de yang stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i rgyud las bshad kyi rgyud gzhan las ni sbas so //
T02TD1757E:239a-23: aom ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD1757E:239a-24: de yang zla ba phyed pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1757E:239a-25: sh'un+ya d'a ni stong pa dang thig le'i rang bzhin mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD1757E:239a-26: dzny'a ni don yod grub pa /
T02TD1757E:239a-27: a'u'i rang bzhin drug pa'i dbyangs /
T02TD1757E:239a-30: sv'a bh'a ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan /
T02TD1757E:239a-32: de ltar yongs su rdzogs pa ni h'um gi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1757E:239a-33: a'anma ko ni rang gi bdag nyid do //
T02TD1757E:239a-34: de ltar tshur bsdus pas rang gi bdag nyid do //
T02TD1757E:239a-35: de yang ji ltar rjes su bshad pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1757E:239a-36: de nas yang lan la bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar bka' stsal ba /
T02TD1757E:239a-37: stong pa'i rang bzhin ni rgyud lngar 'khor ba las rnam par chad pa'i stong pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
T02TD1757E:239a-38: 'khor ba thams cad kyang bden pa'i rang bzhin kyang ma yin /
T02TD1757E:239a-39: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis sdong bu gsum la 'dzeg pa'i sems can phra mo gang zhig gyen du 'dzegs kyang slar lhung ba ltar /
T02TD1757E:239b-0: 'khor ba'i g-yang las slar lhung bar 'gur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' @239b stsal to //
T02TD1757E:239b-1: de yang gus pa chen pos mnyan na /
T02TD1757E:239b-2: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD1757E:239b-3: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni //
T02TD1757E:239b-4: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la //
T02TD1757E:239b-6: sa ni me la rnam par thim //
T02TD1757E:239b-7: chu ni me la bsdus pas te //
T02TD1757E:239b-8: me ni rlung la thim par 'gyur //
T02TD1757E:239b-9: rlung ni stong pa'i rang bzhin no /
T02TD1757E:239b-10: 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan //
T02TD1757E:239b-11: skad cig gis na bzod par gshegs //
T02TD1757E:239b-12: yod pa ma yin med pa'ang min //
T02TD1757E:239b-13: gnyis po rnam par spangs pa ste //
T02TD1757E:239b-14: skad cig gis nam mkha'i dkyil du pha rol gyi dbang phyug yi ge bam las padma ser po /
T02TD1757E:239b-15: lte ba la ram gyi yi ge dmar pos mtshan pa /
T02TD1757E:239b-16: de'i steng du yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa las gri gug h'um gi yi ges byin gyis brlabs pa /
T02TD1757E:239b-17: de yang ro'i steng du rkang pas mnan pa /
T02TD1757E:239b-18: klu brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
T02TD1757E:239b-20: gdengs ka'i dbang pos dbu skra bcings pa /
T02TD1757E:239b-22: klu'i dbang pos rna ba'i rgyan du byas pa /
T02TD1757E:239b-23: rigs ldan khra bos dpung pa'i rgyan du byas pa /
T02TD1757E:239b-24: dung skyong dkar pos lag gdub tu byas pa /
T02TD1757E:239b-25: padma ser pos do shal du byas pa /
T02TD1757E:239b-26: stobs kyi rgyu ljang gus dag byed tshangs skud du brgyan pa /
T02TD1757E:239b-27: nor rgyas kyi bu khu ba'i mdog can gyis rked rgyan du byas pa /
T02TD1757E:239b-28: padma chen po pdama'i sdong bu'i kha dog can gyis rkang gdub tu byas pa /
T02TD1757E:239b-29: thams cad kyang phat kyi sgra sgrogs pa /
T02TD1757E:239b-31: mche ba rab tu gtsigs shing lce gnyis bsgyur ba /
T02TD1757E:239b-32: rang gzugs kyi rig ma la snyoms par 'jug pa /
T02TD1757E:239b-33: de yang bcom ldan 'das ma sku mdog nag mo /
T02TD1757E:239b-34: hr'i'i yi ge las yongs su rdzogs pa /
T02TD1757E:239b-35: gcer bu rgyan dang bral ba /
T02TD1757E:239b-36: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa /
T02TD1757E:239b-37: g-yon pa na thong pa 'dzin pa /
T02TD1757E:239b-38: g-yas pa na ni rdo rje gri gug / snying ga las 'phros pa'i 'od zer zhal nas 'phros pas nam mkha' yongs su bkang ste /
T02TD1757E:239b-39: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ste snying ga'i sa bon la bcug nas /
T02TD1757E:239b-40: rdo rje'i lam nas bton te yum gyi padmar phab ste sa bon du blta'o //
T02TD1757E:239b-41: sa bon las 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs pa /
T02TD1757E:240a-0: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin @240a * //
T02TD1757E:240a-2: mdun du kam gyi sa bon las byung ba'i nag po 'jigs par byed pa /
T02TD1757E:240a-3: lho ru kam gyi sa bon las lha mo ka r'a li /
T02TD1757E:240a-4: nub tu bam las byung ba'i lha mo bha ra li /
T02TD1757E:240a-5: bang du be t'a li bam gyi sa bon las byung ba /
T02TD1757E:240a-6: thams cad kyang gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa /
T02TD1757E:240a-7: gcer bu dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa /
T02TD1757E:240a-11: snying ga'i sa bon gyis ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs nas bstims te /
T02TD1757E:240a-12: de yang thog mar dbang bskur la /
T02TD1757E:240a-13: dbang rtags su mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa'o //
T02TD1757E:240a-14: ras ris dang lugs ma bya ba byas pa sngon du bzhag la /
T02TD1757E:240a-15: mchod pa kun gyis mchod de /
T02TD1757E:240a-17: bdud rtsi myangs pas nag po chen po la gtor ma sbyin te /
T02TD1757E:240a-18: aa yi ris las dag byed ni //
T02TD1757E:240a-19: mi mgo gsum gyi sgyed bu'i steng //
T02TD1757E:240a-20: padma'i snod ni yongs rdzogs pas //
T02TD1757E:240a-22: zur gsum ram gyi yi ges mtshan //
T02TD1757E:240a-24: sngon po gzhu yi dbyibs can g-yo //
T02TD1757E:240a-25: rgyal mtshan dzham gyi yi ges bskyed //
T02TD1757E:240a-26: de nas rnam par snang mdzad ming //
T02TD1757E:240a-27: rigs ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi //
T02TD1757E:240a-28: h'um la sogs pa'i sa bon gyis //
T02TD1757E:240a-29: myos byed dang ni sha lnga dang /
T02TD1757E:240a-30: h'um las byung ba'i rdo rjes bcad //
T02TD1757E:240a-31: kha chod kyis ni rnam par dkrugs //
T02TD1757E:240a-32: rlung g-yos pas ni me sbar te //
T02TD1757E:240a-33: thams cad gcig tu bzhu ba las //
T02TD1757E:240a-34: rdo rje yis ni rnam par dkrugs //
T02TD1757E:240a-35: dag cing dri ma med par sbyangs //
T02TD1757E:240a-37: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ka nas //
T02TD1757E:240a-38: bdud rtsi ye shes gzugs su dgug / sngags kyi gzugs su 'dres par bsam //
T02TD1757E:240a-39: mchog tu gyur pa'i bdud rtsi lnga //
T02TD1757E:240a-40: yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD1757E:240a-41: dkyil 'khor lha la gtor zhing mchog / ljags rnams dkar po'i gdengs can la //
T02TD1757E:240a-42: h'um gis rnam par mtshan pa yis //
T02TD1757E:240a-43: 'od zer ba dag rnam pa can //
T02TD1757E:240a-44: ljags kyis bkug cing gsol bar bsam //
T02TD1757E:240a-45: 'dir ni bdud rtsi lnga rnams myang bar byas pas ji ltar bshang ba'i gtor ma sbyin te /
T02TD1757E:240a-46: de nas sngags kyi bzlas pa la brtson par bya'o //
T02TD1757E:240b-1: dang po rnam par snang mdzad sbyin //
T02TD1757E:240b-2: sgra chen pos ni sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1757E:240b-3: de las nag po'i skad sbyin te //
T02TD1757E:240b-4: de rjes h'um ni sbyin par bya //
T02TD1757E:240b-5: phat gnyis kyi ni sngags kyis brgyan //
T02TD1757E:240b-6: sv'a h'a las rnams thams cad la //
T02TD1757E:240b-7: snying ga dang kha nas mngon par 'thon te /
T02TD1757E:240b-8: lte ba'i padmar phab pa las /
T02TD1757E:240b-9: 'di ni lce la'ang ram gyi yi ge bsams la /
T02TD1757E:240b-10: de yang nyi ma'i sngags kyi sgrub thabs bla ma dam pa'i man ngag gis bshad par lte ba'i sna tshogs padma la song nas /
T02TD1757E:240b-12: yang sngon gyi lam nas 'od zer rnam par 'phros la /
T02TD1757E:240b-13: de yang yig rdog re re bzhin mngon sum du 'phro bar bsgom mo //
T02TD1757E:240b-14: de yang yi ge phreng ba'i rang bzhin du'o //
T02TD1757E:240b-15: de lta bu zla ba drug gis nges par 'grub po //
T02TD1757E:240b-16: dngos grub kyang thob cing dbang dang dgug pa'i dngos grub gnyis ni thog mar ro //
T02TD1757E:240b-17: zla ba brgyad kyis rengs pa dang bskrad pa'o //
T02TD1757E:240b-18: zla ba dgu yis zhe sdang ba dang gsad pa'o //
T02TD1757E:240b-19: zla ba bcu yis zhi ba dang rgyas pa'o //
T02TD1757E:240b-20: zla ba bcu gcig gis 'jig rten thams cad kyi grub pa dang 'gugs par byed do //
T02TD1757E:240b-21: zla ba bcu gnyis kyis grub pa brgyad 'grub pa la the tshom za bar mi bya'o //
T02TD1757E:240b-22: de nas gzhan brjod par bya ba /
T02TD1757E:240b-23: brtson 'grus kyis bsngags pa'i 'bras bu rjod par byed de /
T02TD1757E:240b-24: 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi sgra ni 'od dpag med do //
T02TD1757E:240b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1757E:240b-26: stong phrag bcu gnyis pa nag po chen po'i rgyud las /
T02TD1757E:240b-27: de'i sngags kyi 'bras bu bshad pa /
T02TD1757E:240b-28: bdag gi bla mas ni rnam par sbas te /
T02TD1757E:240b-29: de las 'jig rten thams cad rnam par rmongs par bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1757E:240b-30: bdag gis ni sngags kyi sgrub thabs bla ma dam pa'i man ngag gis bshad par bya ste //
T02TD1757E:240b-31: zla ba drug ni sngon du bsnyen pa'o //
T02TD1757E:240b-32: de'i nang du 'jig rten gsum dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:240b-33: thams cad kyang byang chub kyi sems la sbyar ba'i don du'o //
T02TD1757E:240b-34: sgrub pa po'i yid la bsams pa'i don dang /
T02TD1757E:240b-35: gdams ngag 'dis dbang du bya zhing dgug par bya ste /
T02TD1757E:240b-37: dang po sgrub pa pos snying gar yi ge aa las skyes pa'i padma dmar po /
T02TD1757E:241a-0: de'i lte ba la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de yang ra'i yi ge las byung @241a * //
T02TD1757E:241a-2: / de'i steng du yi ge h'um dmar po /
T02TD1757E:241a-3: de yang lcags kyu lta bu'i sa bon blta bar bya'o //
T02TD1757E:241a-4: de lta bu'i bsgom par bya ba 'dod pa'i rgyal po gcer bu / dpal nag po chen po nyi ma 'char kha'i mdog ltar dmar ba /
T02TD1757E:241a-5: phyag gnyis pa rin po che'i cod pan can /
T02TD1757E:241a-6: g-yas pa na lcags kyu 'dzin cing /
T02TD1757E:241a-7: g-yon pa na rdo rje zhags pa /
T02TD1757E:241a-10: mgo bo'i phreng ba khrag 'dzag pas brgyan pa /
T02TD1757E:241a-11: nyi ma bye ba'i gzi brjid can /
T02TD1757E:241a-14: stag gi pags pas smad dkris pa /
T02TD1757E:241a-15: klu dmar po brgyad kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD1757E:241a-16: g-yas pa'i zhabs kyis 'dod pa'i lha mnan pa /
T02TD1757E:241a-17: g-yon pa'i zhabs kyis dga' bo'i gsang ba'i bde chen mnan pa /
T02TD1757E:241a-19: rdo rje chos kyis spyi bo la brgyan pa /
T02TD1757E:241a-20: de'i snying gar h'um dmar po las 'od zer 'phros pas /
T02TD1757E:241a-21: ro ma dang rkyang ma dang /
T02TD1757E:241a-23: dbral ba g-yas pa nas bskor te 'phros pas /
T02TD1757E:241a-24: thams cad phyag g-yas pa nas bsdus te /
T02TD1757E:241a-25: lcags kyu nas lcags kyu ltar 'phros pas /
T02TD1757E:241a-26: sems can thams cad rdo rje'i lam du bsdus la padmar phab la /
T02TD1757E:241a-27: bde ba chen po skyes te dbang du gyur par bsam mo //
T02TD1757E:241a-28: de lta bu'i byed pas dbab par bya'o //
T02TD1757E:241a-29: yang der gnas nas g-yon pa nas bskor te /
T02TD1757E:241a-30: de bzhin du snying ga'i h'um la bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD1757E:241a-31: de'i 'od zer chags pa dang rjes su chags pas /
T02TD1757E:241a-32: h'um gi dang por mar me'i rtse mo las mngon par byung ste /
T02TD1757E:241a-33: 'jig rten gsum po stong zhing bde ba chen por byas la /
T02TD1757E:241a-34: de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas sngags kyi bzlas pa brtsam par bya ste /
T02TD1757E:241a-35: aom hram hrim hro h'um phat /
T02TD1757E:241a-36: sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brjod pa'i mod la /
T02TD1757E:241a-37: bud med thams cad mtshan ma g-yo zhing 'dod par byed par byed do //
T02TD1757E:241a-38: 'dod pa rnams kyang gzi brjid dang ldan zhing /
T02TD1757E:241a-39: sems can thams cad 'dod pas rgyas zhing khu ba 'pho bar byed do //
T02TD1757E:241a-40: gzugs po yang g-yo zhing 'gyur la /
T02TD1757E:241a-42: skra grol la 'dod pas myos par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:241a-44: 'gro ba drug gi sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing /
T02TD1757E:241b-0: sgrub @241b pa po'i rkang pa'i 'og tu ji ltar bsams pa bzhin thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:241b-1: 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa byas pas /
T02TD1757E:241b-2: sbyor ba can ma dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:241b-3: de nas dbang du bya ba'i cho ga brjod pa /
T02TD1757E:241b-4: na ma:ke li ki la:sam bhu tha pa nee tre bhi ka ra ne /
T02TD1757E:241b-5: biku rva bi kurva dzambha sha mi sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:241b-6: de nas sbyor ba can ma mthong bas /
T02TD1757E:241b-7: mig brgyad de bzlas pa byas pas /
T02TD1757E:241b-8: de ma thag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:241b-11: aa di sam buddh'a ya ku ru ku ru lam bhe lam bhe ne lu ne sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:241b-12: sngags 'di rang nyid nyal ba'i tshe bud med kyi ming nas bzung la bzlas pa byas na /
T02TD1757E:241b-13: dpag tshad brgyan yod kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:241b-16: na ma:sarba buddhe bhyo dza hi buddha aa no dza ra pre si do me b'a tsa nam ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:241b-17: de nas gang du 'dug par bzlas pa byas pas /
T02TD1757E:241b-19: dpa' mo'i ming nas bzung ste bzlas pas /
T02TD1757E:241b-20: thams cad rang bzhin gyis dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:241b-21: na ma: kshi pra gha mi ku ru ku ru bi ma la ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:241b-22: chu la lan bdun bzlas te /
T02TD1757E:241b-23: skyes pa'am bud med gang gi ming nas bzung ste 'thungs na dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:241b-24: na ma:ka tram ka tri gro ra r'u pi ni che ge mo me ba sha ma n'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:241b-26: dang po zas kham gcig la gang gi ming nas bzung ste /
T02TD1757E:241b-27: lan bdun bzlas nas zos pas /
T02TD1757E:241b-30: ae hye hi bh'u ta pra tra dhu ta k'aryam ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:241b-31: de nas mig sman la brgya phrag brgya bzlas /
T02TD1757E:241b-32: rang gi mig la bskus na /
T02TD1757E:241b-33: thog mar mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:241b-35: na ma: pre kha ka ya manydzu gho sha k'a ya pre khi to si dzha hi lam ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:241b-36: de nas yungs kar la bzlas la /
T02TD1757E:241b-37: gang gi khang par gtor ba de dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:241b-38: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02TD1757E:241b-40: ma h'a be t'a l'i sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:241b-41: de nas rang gi khu ba dang ;
T02TD1757E:241b-42: / ga bur la brgya rtsa gcig bzlas te /
T02TD1757E:241b-43: gang gi ming nas bzung ste sbas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:241b-44: na mo buddh'a ya dha rma sam gha badzra p'a n'i bhya: sh'i ta pim ga le la h'um ku ru dzva la dzva la dzva la sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:242a-0: gi wang la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te thig le byas pas ji ltar mthong ba thams cad dbang du @242a * //
T02TD1757E:242a-2: ham bho bra sha ka ya ti aa mu ka sha ma nu ghri dbyas ma ne sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:242a-3: de ma thag tu mi 'ong na /
T02TD1757E:242a-5: skyes pa ji ltar yid la bsams la bsgyur bar bya'o //
T02TD1757E:242a-6: de rnams dbang du bya ba'i las so //
T02TD1757E:242a-7: bdag gi bla mas ni mdor bsdus te gsungs pa /
T02TD1757E:242a-8: kho bos ni rab tu phye ste rgyas par bshad do //
T02TD1757E:242a-9: ma nges par 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pas /
T02TD1757E:242a-10: las thams cad kyi 'bras bu ster ba ni /
T02TD1757E:242a-11: sgrub thabs las shes par bya'o //
T02TD1757E:242a-12: de nas brjod par bya ba /
T02TD1757E:242a-13: dpag tu med pa'i las rdzogs par byed pa /
T02TD1757E:242a-14: dang por bskrad par bya ba'i las bshad pa /
T02TD1757E:242a-15: aom ksham ha hu ha aa mu ka sh'a autstsha ta ya h'um phat /
T02TD1757E:242a-16: bskrad pa la ni du ba'i kha dog can /
T02TD1757E:242a-17: gri gug dang thod pa thogs pa /
T02TD1757E:242a-18: gzhan rnams ni sngar brjod pa bzhin la /
T02TD1757E:242a-19: don yod grub pas dbu rgyan byas pa /
T02TD1757E:242a-20: lho phyogs su kha bltas te /
T02TD1757E:242a-21: sems dpangs mtho bas bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD1757E:242a-23: stong phrag nyi shus kyang 'grub ste /
T02TD1757E:242a-24: dur khrod kyi thal ba blangs la /
T02TD1757E:242a-28: de nas dug lang ga li dang /
T02TD1757E:242a-31: rnga mo'i rus pa rnams la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
T02TD1757E:242a-32: btab pas dgra bo rengs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:242a-33: the tshom med par skrod par 'gyur te /
T02TD1757E:242a-35: zhag bdun byas nas sgor sbas na /
T02TD1757E:242a-36: sngar brjod pa'i dug lang ga li dang /
T02TD1757E:242a-37: mgrin rings ni rnga mo ste /
T02TD1757E:242a-39: de nas yi ge dza:'i sa bon las byung ba'i skyes bu lag na dbyug pa thogs pa bsgoms nas /
T02TD1757E:242a-40: bde byed kyi bla ma dang /
T02TD1757E:242a-41: zhag bdun gyis nges par skrod par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:242a-43: de nas skyes pa'i rus pa la khyab kyi gzugs byas la sgor sbas na /
T02TD1757E:242a-44: khyim der rab tu 'jigs pa skye zhing /
T02TD1757E:242a-45: 'byung po chen po'i gnas bzhin du 'gyur ro//
T02TD1757E:242a-48: mtshan mo thun gcig la'ang rung ste /
T02TD1757E:242a-52: ser po mi'u thung lto ba rab tu 'phyang ba /
T02TD1757E:242a-53: thod pa dang gri gug thogs pa /
T02TD1757E:242b-1: rin po che'i cod pan can /
T02TD1757E:242b-2: brgya phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD1757E:242b-4: aa mu kam stam bha ya h'um phat /
T02TD1757E:242b-5: 'di la sogs pa gzhan ni go sla'o //
T02TD1757E:242b-7: nag po'i phyogs la lhor kha bltas te /
T02TD1757E:242b-8: si las thig le byas la gos nag po bgos la /
T02TD1757E:242b-9: thod pa dang gri gug lag na thogs pa /
T02TD1757E:242b-10: mi bskyod pa nag po'i cod pan can /
T02TD1757E:242b-13: thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros pas nag po dang /
T02TD1757E:242b-19: thod pa dang gri gug thogs pa /
T02TD1757E:242b-20: rlung gi shugs ltar mgyogs pa /
T02TD1757E:242b-21: dgra bo'i kha nas zhugs te /
T02TD1757E:242b-24: nang cha rnams kyang bcad cing /
T02TD1757E:242b-25: thun gsum du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1757E:242b-27: mi'i thod pa zan gyis bkang pa la khrag btab ste /
T02TD1757E:242b-28: phag pa la sogs pa'i sha rnams dang btab la /
T02TD1757E:242b-34: sran ma dang bsres pa'i zan dang /
T02TD1757E:242b-39: mtshan phyeng [*phyed?] na gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1757E:242b-40: de nas sha za'i sgrub thabs la /
T02TD1757E:242b-41: sngon du brjod pa'i nag po chen bo'i gzugs su bsgoms la /
T02TD1757E:242b-42: stong phrag bcu bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:242b-45: kundha la'i ming can gyi gnod sbyin mo gnyis bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1757E:242b-47: dri zhim pos kyang sbags te /
T02TD1757E:242b-48: zhun chen gyi mar me'i snag tshas sha za gnas pa'i sdong po'i rtser bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1757E:242b-49: nag po dang po'i lang tsho can /
T02TD1757E:242b-51: rgyal po chen po ltar rol pa'i 'dug stangs kyis bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1757E:242b-55: byug pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1757E:242b-56: de nas sgrub pa po gang za ba thams cad kyi lhag ma nas sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1757E:242b-57: mtshan mo'i nang du rtag tu lhag ma re sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1757E:242b-59: aom aa na le kundha li /
T02TD1757E:242b-60: grihn pinta pi sh'a ts'i ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:243a-2: de nas cho ga gzhan brjod pa /
T02TD1757E:243a-3: bong bu'i gdong can bsgom par byas la /
T02TD1757E:243a-4: bong bu'i gdong can lag pa gnyis kyis bum pa bzung la /
T02TD1757E:243a-5: 'gron bu'i bum pa'i gdan la 'dug pa /
T02TD1757E:243a-6: shing ke ta ka'i me tog ku su mas brgyan pa /
T02TD1757E:243a-7: zla ba gcig gi bar du lhag ma byin pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:243a-8: sngon du brjod pa'i cho ga ghu pa ta'i sha za bri bar bya'o //
T02TD1757E:243a-9: yung ba dang rdo zho bsres pas bri bar bya /
T02TD1757E:243a-10: skyil krung phyed pa'i 'dug stangs kyis gnas pa /
T02TD1757E:243a-12: kun nas dga' ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02TD1757E:243a-13: gser gyi khri stegs la 'dug pa ;
T02TD1757E:243a-14: / g-yon pa na rin po che'i snod thogs pa /
T02TD1757E:243a-15: g-yas pa na rin po che'i snye ma thogs pa bris la sngon gyi cho ga bzhin du gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1757E:243a-16: sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa'i bsam pas 'grub par 'gyur gyi /
T02TD1757E:243a-17: rang gi don byed pas ni ma yin no //
T02TD1757E:243a-18: de nas mi 'pho ba'i rnal 'byor brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1757E:243a-19: stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i nag po chen po'i rgyud las /
T02TD1757E:243a-21: 'jig rten gyi ni ston pa po //
T02TD1757E:243a-22: sems can kun gyi don 'ga'i phyir //
T02TD1757E:243a-23: ji ltar sems can thams cad la //
T02TD1757E:243a-24: rgas dang 'chi dang nad sbangs pa //
T02TD1757E:243a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal gsol //
T02TD1757E:243a-26: bzang mo khyod kyis zhus pa'i don //
T02TD1757E:243a-27: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD1757E:243a-28: mi g-yo ba yi bde ba bshad //
T02TD1757E:243a-29: gus ba'i sems kyis mnyan par byos //
T02TD1757E:243a-30: gsang ba las kyang gsang ba ni //
T02TD1757E:243a-31: bde ba chen po bcings pas thebs //
T02TD1757E:243a-32: gyen du 'gro dang gzung ba'i thabs //
T02TD1757E:243a-33: rlung ni rab tu bcings pa brjod //
T02TD1757E:243a-34: bum pa'i chu ltar rab g-yo ba //
T02TD1757E:243a-35: sems ni brtan par byas pa las //
T02TD1757E:243a-38: gsang ba'i mdzod kyi 'og gi sgo //
T02TD1757E:243a-39: bsdams pas bde ba 'dzin par byed //
T02TD1757E:243a-40: de tshe gyen du dangs pa las //
T02TD1757E:243a-41: rlung gi stobs kyis byed par 'gyur //
T02TD1757E:243a-42: ji ltar bum pa stong pa ltar //
T02TD1757E:243a-43: de bzhin stong pa'i rnam 'byor bya //
T02TD1757E:243a-44: khu ba brtan par gyur pa la //
T02TD1757E:243a-45: grub mtha' lnga ka mchog tu 'dod //
T02TD1757E:243a-46: rkyang ma ro ma dbu ma las //
T02TD1757E:243b-0: rlung ni @243b g-yos par 'gyur ba'i tshe //
T02TD1757E:243b-1: de tshe lce ni gyen la bzlog /'dod pas khu ba g-yos pa 'dzin //
T02TD1757E:243b-2: rang gi rlung rnams gyen du 'phangs //
T02TD1757E:243b-3: rtsol ba'i stobs kyis thur du bzung //
T02TD1757E:243b-4: mgrin par rlung rnams gnas pa'i tshe //
T02TD1757E:243b-5: snying gar rlung ni mnyam par sbyor //
T02TD1757E:243b-6: de tshe sems ni brtan par 'gyur //
T02TD1757E:243b-7: rlung ni nang du zin pa'i tshe //
T02TD1757E:243b-8: de tshe stong pa'i rnal 'byor skye //
T02TD1757E:243b-9: lus po rlung gis mnyam par gang //
T02TD1757E:243b-10: de tshe rlung ni dal bas bden //
T02TD1757E:243b-11: ji ltar dam par ston pa'i tshe //
T02TD1757E:243b-12: sems ni stong pa'i rnal 'byor gzung //
T02TD1757E:243b-14: 'chi ba las ni rnam par rgyal //
T02TD1757E:243b-15: sbyar bas gnyer ma med par byed //
T02TD1757E:243b-16: skra dkar dang ni bral bar 'gyur //
T02TD1757E:243b-17: dbang po lnga rnams rab gsal zhing //
T02TD1757E:243b-19: rdo rje padmar ba gnas pa //
T02TD1757E:243b-20: sbyor ba mang pos bskyod par bya //
T02TD1757E:243b-21: byang chub sems ni g-yos pa las //
T02TD1757E:243b-22: g-yos pa de yang gzung bar bya //
T02TD1757E:243b-23: sems kyis nyi ma blangs pa las //
T02TD1757E:243b-24: ji srid nyi ma bskyod pa'i tshe //
T02TD1757E:243b-25: zla ba gnas gzhan 'gro bar byed //
T02TD1757E:243b-26: stong pa'i rnal 'byor brtan par bya //
T02TD1757E:243b-27: sems ni g-yo med gcig tu bya //
T02TD1757E:243b-28: ji srid nyi zla 'byor pa'i tshe //
T02TD1757E:243b-29: lus ni 'chi ba med pa thob //
T02TD1757E:243b-30: ji srid nyi zla gcig sbyor ba //
T02TD1757E:243b-31: de tshe bdag med rnal 'byor bya //
T02TD1757E:243b-32: ri bong nyi ma sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1757E:243b-35: lus ni dus kyis mi za ste //
T02TD1757E:243b-36: bud med dga' bas rjes chags pa //
T02TD1757E:243b-37: rnal 'byor pa yi chags pa yang //
T02TD1757E:243b-38: ji srid mnyam par skye 'gyur ba //
T02TD1757E:243b-39: des ni grub pa rab tu ster //
T02TD1757E:243b-40: aom tsa le tsa le tsi te tsi to munytsa pa ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:243b-41: sngags 'di brjod pa tsam gyis bud med rjes su chags pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:243b-42: de ltar bud med rjes su chags pa'i tshe /
T02TD1757E:243b-43: sgom pa la sbyor bar bya'o //
T02TD1757E:243b-44: na mo buddhe satve bhya h'um shi gi ni sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:243b-45: sbrul mgo gnyis pa mgo po nas nas sor bcu gnyis bzung nas /
T02TD1757E:243b-46: dur khrod kyi me la bsregs te /
T02TD1757E:243b-48: bya ku ra ku'i khrag gis lan bdun gyi bar du spras pas /
T02TD1757E:243b-49: des thig le byas pa'i tshe mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:244a-0: de nas shing skra dkar gyi byang phyogs kyi rtsa ba @244a * //
T02TD1757E:244a-3: nyi ma dang zla ba dang me'i nang du byas la /
T02TD1757E:244a-4: khar bcug na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:244a-8: de rnams la ni lcags so //
T02TD1757E:244a-9: de nas thog ma'i dngul la /
T02TD1757E:244a-10: de'i tshe skyes pa dang sbyar ba'i khu ba gnyis mnyam par sbyar ba la /
T02TD1757E:244a-11: me ni si la btab la /
T02TD1757E:244a-12: 'jig rten gsum pos mi mthong ngo //
T02TD1757E:244a-13: de'ang la l'a ta la til ka byas so //
T02TD1757E:244a-14: de na ti tsha dkar po dang /
T02TD1757E:244a-15: kan tra si ba li dang /
T02TD1757E:244a-17: dang po'i me tog dang khu ba bsres te /
T02TD1757E:244a-19: lcags gsum gyi nang du bcug ste sbyar na ;
T02TD1757E:244a-20: /'jig rten gsum gyi mis mi mthong ngo //
T02TD1757E:244a-21: thog mar rtsva skyes pa'i dus kyi rtse mo la sogs pa'i sa bzhag la /
T02TD1757E:244a-24: rgyal gyi nyin par thig le byas na grub pa'i skyes bus kyang mi mthong ngo //
T02TD1757E:244a-27: de'i 'og gi sa blangs pas so //
T02TD1757E:244a-28: de'ang rgyal gyi nyin par ro //
T02TD1757E:244a-29: sbrang rtsi dang ba bla bsres la /
T02TD1757E:244a-30: dpral bar thig le byas na /
T02TD1757E:244a-31: skyes bu de ni grub pa'i rnal 'byor pas kyang mi mthong ngo //
T02TD1757E:244a-32: gzhan lha smos kyang ci dgos /
T02TD1757E:244a-33: 'di ni mi snang ba'i rab tu dbye ba'o //
T02TD1757E:244a-35: na mo buddha bhya: stam bha ya dzam bha ya mo ha ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:244a-36: de nas khyo po yod pa'i bram ze mo shi ba'i thal ba blangs te /
T02TD1757E:244a-37: lag pa la byugs nas gang la bstan pa'i sems can thams cad rengs par byed do //
T02TD1757E:244a-38: de nas na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02TD1757E:244a-39: kship be kshi pa be ta li sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:244a-40: sngar brjod pa'i thal bas gro ga'i 'dab ma la sngags bris pas mda' rengs par byed do //
T02TD1757E:244a-41: de nas na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02TD1757E:244a-42: dha ksha dza pim ga lo gri ha bh'u ta pa tsa na ni pra ha ra sam kra ma ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:244a-43: sngags 'dis rma bya'i mjug sgro la stong phrag gcig bzlas te /
T02TD1757E:244a-44: nag po chen po'i thang sku'i steng du bzhag la /
T02TD1757E:244a-45: rang gi dpung gi steng du g-yab ste bzhag pas /
T02TD1757E:244a-46: pha rol gyi dpung rengs par byed do //
T02TD1757E:244a-47: nag po chen po'i thang sku la gding dang /
T02TD1757E:244a-48: yung ba bsres pa ser pos bri bar bya /
T02TD1757E:244a-49: rab tu 'jigs pa la 'jigs par byed pa /
T02TD1757E:244a-50: lto ba rab tu rgyas pa /
T02TD1757E:244a-53: rol pa'i 'dug stangs kyis gnas pa /
T02TD1757E:244b-0: phyag gnyis pa g-yas @244b ba'i phyag na ri sna tshogs pa thogs pa /
T02TD1757E:244b-1: g-yon pa'i phyag na thod pa'i steng du me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum 'dzin pa /
T02TD1757E:244b-2: de lta bu thang sku'i steng du rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo 'phyar bar bya'o //
T02TD1757E:244b-3: rang gi dpung rnams kyis mi mthong bar byas la /
T02TD1757E:244b-4: pha rol gyi dpung rnams rengs pa'i don du bstan par bya'o //
T02TD1757E:244b-5: de nas gza' nyi ma'i steng du skar ma rgyal la bab pa na shing sa ra li'i rtsa ba la /
T02TD1757E:244b-6: kshi pa bi kshi pa be ta li sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:244b-7: de'i rjes su sngags 'di rdzas dang sbyar te /
T02TD1757E:244b-8: cho ga bzhin kha nas brjod pas /
T02TD1757E:244b-9: g-yul du zhugs pa'i dgra bo'i ral gri thams cad 'ching bar byed do //
T02TD1757E:244b-10: de nas me bsil ba'i las ni go sla'o //
T02TD1757E:244b-14: sman dza mu ka dang me tog pa ral li'i rtsa ba dang zhib tu btags la /
T02TD1757E:244b-15: sbal pa'i tshil bu dang bsres te /
T02TD1757E:244b-16: rkang pa'i zhabs su bskus na /
T02TD1757E:244b-17: sol ba'i me rab tu 'bar ba'i steng du phyin yang mi tshig go //
T02TD1757E:244b-19: sman mun tri ri'i sdong po dang /
T02TD1757E:244b-22: sbal ba'i zhag dang bsres te /
T02TD1757E:244b-24: mngon du mi tshig par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:244b-25: gzhan lang sbal pa dkar po'i ro skams la /
T02TD1757E:244b-26: gzhan sbal pa'i khrag gis bskus la bsres nas btags te bskus pas me rengs par byed do //
T02TD1757E:244b-27: sbal ba'i tshil bu gang du bskus ba /
T02TD1757E:244b-28: me la reg na me 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:244b-29: de nas rgyal po rengs par byed pa'i las la /
T02TD1757E:244b-30: de nas sman tri shi bhan dhi'i sman de thal bar byas pa la /
T02TD1757E:244b-31: lan bdun bzlas te btab pas /
T02TD1757E:244b-32: rgyal po rengs par byed do //
T02TD1757E:244b-33: de yang tri shi ni 'dab ma gsum pa'i rtsa ba'o //
T02TD1757E:244b-34: de nas chu bcing ba'i cho ga la /
T02TD1757E:244b-35: chu'i nang na 'dug ste bzlas pa byas pas /
T02TD1757E:244b-36: nya 'dru 'dru ba'i khar rin po che bcug la /
T02TD1757E:244b-41: gzugs po thams cad la byugs la /
T02TD1757E:244b-42: chu'i steng du phyin pas chu srin bzhin du steng du lding bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:244b-43: de rnams ni chu bcings pa'i las so //
T02TD1757E:244b-44: de nas bskrad pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD1757E:244b-45: de nas zhe sdang pa la /
T02TD1757E:244b-46: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02TD1757E:244b-48: ma h'a dve sha ka / m'a bi lam pa ru ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:245a-6: gang gi ming nas gzung ste /
T02TD1757E:245a-7: sa la sbas pa de thams cad 'khon par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:245a-8: dge tshul ni btsun pa chung du'o //
T02TD1757E:245a-11: de nas rma bya'i mgo dang /
T02TD1757E:245a-13: sngags 'di brjod cing gcig tu btags la spos kyis bdugs na /
T02TD1757E:245a-14: gang gi ming nas bzung ba de 'khon du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:245a-15: de nas gang zhig phud med khrag 'bab pa'i mtshan mar yungs kar gyi thum po zhag bdun gyi bar du bcug la /
T02TD1757E:245a-16: de'ang bud med sdug bsngal dang ldan pa'i'o //
T02TD1757E:245a-17: gang la yungs kar gyis gtor ba de thams cad 'khon par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:245a-18: de nas bya rog dang 'ug pa'i sgro dang rus pa dang sha blangs la /
T02TD1757E:245a-19: rang nyid bsrung bar byas la /
T02TD1757E:245a-20: spos kyis gang la bdugs pa de mdza' bo yin yang 'khon par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:245a-21: de nas sprul mgo gnyis pa'i shun lpags dang /
T02TD1757E:245a-22: rma bya'i sgro dang mnyam par sbyar te /
T02TD1757E:245a-23: gang la bdugs pa de 'jig rten gsum dang 'khon par 'gyur te /
T02TD1757E:245a-25: rang nyid bsrung ba ni mchog tu gces pa'o //
T02TD1757E:245a-26: 'di rnams rab tu zhe sdang ba'i las so //
T02TD1757E:245a-27: de nas sbyin sreg gi las brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1757E:245a-28: thab ni rgyud thams cad las bshad pas go sla'o //
T02TD1757E:245a-29: rgyud 'di las grub pa brgyad bsgrub pa ni /
T02TD1757E:245a-30: bcom ldan 'das kyis stong phrag drug pa'i rgyud las bka' stsal ba /
T02TD1757E:245a-35: de'i byed pas thams cad shes par bya'o //
T02TD1757E:245a-36: de yang yi ge mangs pas 'jigs nas bsdus te bshad do //
T02TD1757E:245a-37: zhi ba'i thab ni gsang 'dus dang gcig go //
T02TD1757E:245a-38: sbyin sreg gi rab tu dbye ba ni go sla'o //
T02TD1757E:245a-39: de nas mig sman gyi rang bzhin la /
T02TD1757E:245a-40: nam mkha' la spyod pa'i mig blangs la /
T02TD1757E:245a-41: bya rog rgad po'i mig dang /
T02TD1757E:245a-42: bya rgod dmar po'i mig dang /
T02TD1757E:245a-43: dar gyis g-yogs pa'i zla mtshan phyis pa'i dar ro //
T02TD1757E:245a-44: de nas bi la nag po'i mig dang /
T02TD1757E:245a-45: bhri h'a ha bh'u mi la ti'i mgo dang /
T02TD1757E:245a-46: bh'u zug bos 'dab kyi na 'gro ba /
T02TD1757E:245a-48: rna ba'i nang du 'jug pa'i srin bu dang /
T02TD1757E:245a-49: de rnams gcig tu bsres te btags te ri lu byas la /
T02TD1757E:245b-0: mi'i tshil gyi mar me'i snag tsha blangs la @245b bsregs te /
T02TD1757E:245b-1: mig la bskus pas sa 'og gi gter mthong ngo //
T02TD1757E:245b-2: de nas ral gri bsgrub pa la /
T02TD1757E:245b-3: sngar brod pa'i bya'i mig sman blangs la bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02TD1757E:245b-5: shve ta bham shi kha'i shing dang /
T02TD1757E:245b-6: pa la dkar po'i shing dang /
T02TD1757E:245b-7: shing de gnyis kyi shar phyogs kyi 'dab ma blangs la ;
T02TD1757E:245b-9: de rnams kyis bcings pa ni /
T02TD1757E:245b-12: pra ba la ni byi ru'o //
T02TD1757E:245b-15: r'a ja r'u pa ni dngul lo //
T02TD1757E:245b-17: stong phrag nyi shu bzlas pas grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:245b-18: de nas mkha' spyod kyi dngos grub brjod pa ni /
T02TD1757E:245b-19: dz'a ti pha la ma sa brgyad /
T02TD1757E:245b-20: ka ko la ma sa brgyad /
T02TD1757E:245b-21: pi pi ling gi snying po ma sa brgyad /
T02TD1757E:245b-22: mon lug gla sgang ma sa brgyad /
T02TD1757E:245b-23: sga thol gyi chum sa brgyad /
T02TD1757E:245b-25: ga pur gyi chu zho gnyis /
T02TD1757E:245b-26: de thams cad gcig tu bsres la /
T02TD1757E:245b-27: shing s'a h'a ka ra'i 'dab mas gtums la bsreg go //
T02TD1757E:245b-28: de'i steng du ni ma pa'i shing btsigs la sman rnams sa 'og tu sbas te /
T02TD1757E:245b-29: shing pa la sha'i me tog btags pa'i khu ba srang bzhi /
T02TD1757E:245b-30: mar dang sbrang rtsi spags te /
T02TD1757E:245b-31: snod snum can gyi nang du 'bras kyi phung po chen po'i steng du zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gzhug go //
T02TD1757E:245b-32: lhags pa mi 'ong pa'i khung du 'dug la /
T02TD1757E:245b-33: sor mo gsum gyis blangs pa'i chos tsam nyin re bzhin du za'o //
T02TD1757E:245b-34: de'i tshe bza' ba'ang med par longs spyad par bya'o //
T02TD1757E:245b-35: nam mkha'i longs spyod par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:245b-36: de nas grub pa'i sman brjod par bya'o /
T02TD1757E:245b-37: jo+ya ti sma ti'i mar khu srang brgyad /
T02TD1757E:245b-40: aa ru ra sha chen brgya rtsa brgyad /
T02TD1757E:245b-41: de thams cad gcig tu btags pa /
T02TD1757E:245b-42: snod snum can gyi nang du bcug la /
T02TD1757E:245b-43: ba glang gis gcin btang ba'i nang du zla ba drug spang bar bya'o //
T02TD1757E:245b-44: 'o ma dang gcig tu bsres te tur bar bya'o //
T02TD1757E:245b-45: zla ba drug nas rgad pos 'thungs kyang byis par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:245b-46: de nas ci bgyi zhes bka' nyan pa'i sgrub thabs kyi rang bzhin la ta pa si shi ba'i khar thod lo skor bcug la bsregs nas tshig pa'i 'og tu thod lo skor blangs te /
T02TD1757E:245b-47: bzlas ma'i sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1757E:246a-2: de nas mtshan phyed na ci bgyi zhes bka' nyan pa'i pho nyar 'ongs nas /
T02TD1757E:246a-3: bdag gis ci bgyi zhes smra ba la /
T02TD1757E:246a-4: cang mi brjod par ngag thub par bya'o //
T02TD1757E:246a-5: tho rangs kyi tshe nam langs nas ci bgyi zhes smra ba la /
T02TD1757E:246a-6: tho rangs sgrub pa bos smra bar bya ba /
T02TD1757E:246a-8: 'khor pa gang 'dod pa khyer la shog ces smras pas /
T02TD1757E:246a-9: ji ltar yid la bsams pa'i las thams cad rdzogs par byed do //
T02TD1757E:246a-11: ji ltar bde bar longs spyod pa dang /
T02TD1757E:246a-12: bcud dang bcud kyis len thams cad ster ro //
T02TD1757E:246a-13: lha chen po brgyad kyi bu mo yang 'gugs par byed do //
T02TD1757E:246a-14: de la sogs pa'i las thams cad byed do //
T02TD1757E:246a-15: de nas sha za'i sgrub thabs kyi rang bzhin la /
T02TD1757E:246a-16: bram ze shi ba'i khar lcags brgyad gcig tu bzhu ba'i ri lu bcug la /
T02TD1757E:246a-17: mer bsregs pa'i thal ba blangs la /
T02TD1757E:246a-18: lcags brgyad kyi ri lu zhib par btags te /
T02TD1757E:246a-19: spra tshil gyis ri lu byas la /
T02TD1757E:246a-20: ga pur gyi mar me btang ste /
T02TD1757E:246a-21: dur khrod du brgya phrag brgyad bzlas la /
T02TD1757E:246a-22: de'i te sha za 'ongs nas ci bgyi zhes smra ba la /
T02TD1757E:246a-23: cang mi smra bar 'dug par bya'o //
T02TD1757E:246a-24: ngag bcad de thub par 'dug par bya'o //
T02TD1757E:246a-25: de nas ri lu khyer te lha'i khang par mtshan mo thog thag bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD1757E:246a-26: tho rangs grogs po longs zhes smra ste /
T02TD1757E:246a-28: ri lus ci 'dod pa'i ming yi ge bris pas /
T02TD1757E:246a-29: ji ltar sgrub pa pos bka' stsal pa bzhin grub par byed do //
T02TD1757E:246a-30: ri lu bsgrub pa'i sngags ni /
T02TD1757E:246a-31: aom ru ri ru ri ru ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:246a-32: da ni gtor ma'i cho ga brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1757E:246a-33: lha'i rnal 'byor gyis bsam gtan la gnas pas /
T02TD1757E:246a-34: rtsa ba nas bshad pa'i bdud rtsi rnams bsogs la /
T02TD1757E:246a-35: dbang po la sogs pa rnams la gter ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1757E:246a-36: nyung ba dang ni mang ba yi //
T02TD1757E:246a-37: bzlas pa byas pa'i nang du ni //
T02TD1757E:246a-39: shar gyi phyogs su gzhag par bya //
T02TD1757E:246a-40: dbang po spyan stong ldan pa dkar //
T02TD1757E:246a-41: chibs ni glang po dkar po'i steng //
T02TD1757E:246a-42: g-yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste //
T02TD1757E:246a-43: g-yon pa rol pas gnas pa yin //
T02TD1757E:246a-44: gshin rje rab tu sngo ba phyag gnyis pa /
T02TD1757E:246a-45: g-yas pa na dbyug pa 'dzin pa /
T02TD1757E:246b-1: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du langs pa /
T02TD1757E:246b-2: ral pa dang smin ma rab tu ser zhing ring ba /
T02TD1757E:246b-3: rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02TD1757E:246b-4: ma he'i steng na rol pas 'dug pa /
T02TD1757E:246b-5: chu lha dkar po phyag gnyis pa /
T02TD1757E:246b-7: g-yas pa na klu'i zhags pa /
T02TD1757E:246b-10: nor bdag lus ngan ser po /
T02TD1757E:246b-12: g-yas pa na shing thog bi dza b'ur 'dzin pa /
T02TD1757E:246b-13: g-yon pa na ne'u le'i rkyal pa 'dzin pa /
T02TD1757E:246b-14: me tog gi shing ta la'i steng na 'dug pa'o //
T02TD1757E:246b-15: bde byed dkar po phyag gnyis pa /
T02TD1757E:246b-16: glang gi steng na stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can dbu la thod pas brgyan pa /
T02TD1757E:246b-17: ral pa'i cod pan zla bas brgyan pa /
T02TD1757E:246b-18: g-yas pa na rtse gsum pa /
T02TD1757E:246b-19: g-yon pa'i phyag gis dkar mo'i nu ma la reg pa /
T02TD1757E:246b-22: dkar mo sku mdog ser mo /
T02TD1757E:246b-24: g-yas pas bde byed la 'khyud pa /
T02TD1757E:246b-25: g-yon pa me long la lta ba'o //
T02TD1757E:246b-26: me lha ral pa gsum pa /
T02TD1757E:246b-32: g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa dang bgrang phreng /
T02TD1757E:246b-33: g-yon pas dbyug pa dang spyi blugs so //
T02TD1757E:246b-34: bden bral drag po phyag gnyis pa /
T02TD1757E:246b-35: gcer bu ro'i stan la 'dug pa ;
T02TD1757E:246b-36: / rol pa'i 'dug stangs kyis gnas pa /
T02TD1757E:246b-38: thod pas dbu la brgyan pa /
T02TD1757E:246b-39: g-yas pa na gri gug / g-yon pa na thod khrag go //
T02TD1757E:246b-40: rlung lha ser po ri dags la zhon pa /
T02TD1757E:246b-42: ba dan sngon po gnyis 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD1757E:246b-43: zla ba dkar po 'khor lo'i steng na /
T02TD1757E:246b-45: g-yas pas ku mu ta 'dzin pa /
T02TD1757E:246b-46: g-yon pa rol pas gnas pa /
T02TD1757E:246b-48: rta bdun gyi steng na nyi ma dmar po phyag gnyis pa /
T02TD1757E:246b-49: g-yas pa padma'i steng na rdo rje 'dzin pa /
T02TD1757E:246b-50: g-yon pa padma'i steng na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD1757E:246b-51: tshangs pa gdong bzhi pa dkar po ngang pa la zhon pa /
T02TD1757E:246b-55: g-yas pa skud pa'i phreng ba /
T02TD1757E:246b-56: g-yon pa na padma dang spyi blugs so //
T02TD1757E:246b-57: sa'i lha mo sku mdog ser mo padma'i steng na g-yas pa na padma /
T02TD1757E:246b-58: g-yon pa na rol pas gnas pa'o //
T02TD1757E:247a-0: lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags @247a * //
T02TD1757E:247a-2: shing rta'i steng du gnas pa /
T02TD1757E:247a-5: g-yon pa rol pas gnas pa'o //
T02TD1757E:247a-7: gnod sbyin dang dri za dang yi dags dang /
T02TD1757E:247a-10: klu'i rgyal po dang bcas pa thams cad rtsol bas bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1757E:247a-11: phyi nas dbang po la sogs rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis yul du mthong bar bsam ste /
T02TD1757E:247a-12: thog mar de dag gi lus rdul lta bur byas la /
T02TD1757E:247a-13: rang gi sa bon las 'od zer 'phros pas /
T02TD1757E:247a-14: bdud rtsi'i rgyun lta bus lus bkrus te yongs su rdzogs par bsam mo //
T02TD1757E:247a-15: rang rang gi ljags rdo rje'i aas mtshan pas drangs par bsam mo //
T02TD1757E:247a-16: de ltar bdud rtsi la gsol bas /
T02TD1757E:247a-17: sgrub pa pos ji ltar yid la bsams pa'i don thams cad grub par bsam mo //
T02TD1757E:247a-18: g-yon pa dril bu dkrol zhing /
T02TD1757E:247a-19: g-yas pas bdug spos bzung la /
T02TD1757E:247a-20: gnas brgyad du g-yon pas dril bu dkrol bar bya ste /
T02TD1757E:247a-23: su pa ta ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:247a-24: aom aagna ye ha bya ka bya b'a h'a na ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:247a-25: aom dza ma ya pra ta aa dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:247a-26: aom nee rri ty'a ya raksha p'a ti pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:247a-27: aom ba ru na ya n'a ga aa dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:247a-28: aom b'a ya bee aanta riksha tsa ra sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:247a-29: aom ku be r'a ya dza ksha aa dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:247a-30: aom ai sh'a n'a ya bh'u ta aa dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:247a-32: aom so ma ya na kasha tra aa dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:247a-33: aom s'urya gra ha aa dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:247a-34: aom bra hma na ye be ta aa dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:247a-35: aom bi ma tsi tra ne sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:247a-36: aom aa dhva ya s'u re bhya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:247a-37: sngags 'di dag brjod pa'i rjes la gtor ma'i sngags brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1757E:247a-38: de la gtor ma'i sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1757E:247a-39: aom shring k'i ma h'um phat /
T02TD1757E:247a-49: ai dam ba lim ha ha ha h'am kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02TD1757E:247a-51: phu phem h'a aatta h'a sa /
T02TD1757E:247a-61: de dag ni gnas brgyad du shes par bya'o //
T02TD1757E:247a-62: de rnams ni gtor ma'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1757E:247a-63: aom ma h'a k'a la hrim hri phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:247b-0: hri: bcom @247b ldan 'das me'i snying po'o //
T02TD1757E:247b-2: aom ma h'a k'a l'i h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:247b-3: snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o //
T02TD1757E:247b-4: ao k'a li h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:247b-5: aom k'a ra li ye h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:247b-6: aom b'a r'a l'i ye h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:247b-7: aom be t'a l'i h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1757E:247b-8: de nas ras ris kyi cho ga ni go sla'o //
T02TD1757E:247b-9: rang gi khyim du lha la mchod pa bya ste /
T02TD1757E:247b-10: sngon du bsnyen pa byas pas ni las thams cad grub par 'gyur la /
T02TD1757E:247b-11: rdzogs ldan dus na gcig yin te //
T02TD1757E:247b-12: gsum ldan la ni gnyis 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:247b-13: gnyis ldan la ni gsum 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:247b-14: rtsod ldan dus na bzhi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1757E:247b-15: dgod cing bzlas pa rtse zhing yengs //
T02TD1757E:247b-16: za zhing 'khrig pa spyod pa'i tshe //
T02TD1757E:247b-17: dus rnams kun la bzlas par bya //
T02TD1757E:247b-18: de tshe bdud kyi las dang bral //
T02TD1757E:247b-19: rnam par rtog pa thams cad kun //
T02TD1757E:247b-20: sgra rnams nag po chen por sgrogs //
T02TD1757E:247b-21: thams cad sngags su shes par bya //
T02TD1757E:247b-22: yid la bsams pa'i 'bras bu thob //
T02TD1757E:247b-23: kun la 'di ni mi sbyin te //
T02TD1757E:247b-24: slob ma'i snod rnams brtags la sbyin //
T02TD1757E:247b-26: 'jig rten gsum na gces pa'i mchog /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho sgrol ba yi //
T02TD1757E:247b-27: skye ba dang ni 'chi ba la //
T02TD1757E:247b-29: chags pa zhe sdang chu srin 'phyo //
T02TD1757E:247b-30: sems kyis 'gram gnyis bde ba la //
T02TD1757E:247b-31: phra ma ser sna phrag dog gis //
T02TD1757E:247b-32: byed pa nag po chen po yis //
T02TD1757E:247b-33: bde chen sgyu ma'i grong khyer na //
T02TD1757E:247b-34: byas pa sems can kun gyi don //
T02TD1757E:247b-35: bdag gis bsags pa'i bsod nams kyis //
T02TD1757E:247b-36: nyon mongs thams cad gcod par shog /'jig rten 'das pa'i grub pa 'thob //
T02TD1757E:247b-37: dpal nag po chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rnam par bshad pa /
T02TD1757E:247b-38: lhan cig skyes pa'i zhabs kyi slob ma /
T02TD1757E:247b-39: slob dpon li ka ri'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1757E:247b-41: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shr'i na rendra bha dra dang /
T02TD1757E:247b-42: bod kyi lo ts'a ba au rgyan pa rin chen dpal gyis ri bo chen po spu tra'i mgul du /
T02TD1757E:247b-43: bde chen gling gi pho brang chen por bskyur ba'o//
